task.title: How to subtract numbers
task.shortdesc: Here you will find instrauctions about using the subtraction feature of JPS Calculator app.

prereq.p: To successfully subtract numbers, you must know what is subtraction.

result.p: The result from the subtraction is displayed.

taskbody.example:
You want to subtract 2 from 3. The equation will look like: 3-2=1. you enter 3. Press minus. Enter 2. Press equals.
The result 1 appears on the screen.
